attributes.action: Stop Terrestrial advertisements for debt problems.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop advertisements for debt problems which appear on digital, terrestrial and satellite  television and radio, I feel harassed and think they should only advertise on one committed channel where " If you need to seek help you just tune in "
The problem is, their advertising on every channel and every 10 minutes.
